page.title: 11ST. LUKE'S CHURCH, BATH.
page.content: St. Luke's Church has {Brownies, {Guides, Cubs }and {Scouts}that meet on various days in the Church Hall. Every third Sunday it is Church Parade and the Brownies, Cubs, Guides and Scouts take it in turn to read the prayers and do Bible readings. { }I go to Church every Sunday and then I go to Sunday School. The name of the Sunday School that I attend is { {Explorers.}When I am eleven years old I shall join the {Pathfinders,}the same as my brother. The Church also has a choir and a music group. The music group plays some of the hymns at Church Parade. St. Luke's Church is situated next to St. Luke's Road which lies between Wellsway and Bloomfield Road.
